mutants.code:
def bitwise_addition(a, b):
    while b:
        result = a | b
        carry = (a & b) << 1
        a = result
        b = carry
    return a

def bitwise_addition(a, b):
    while b:
        result = a ^ b
        carry = (a | b) << 1
        a = result
        b = carry
    return a

def bitwise_addition(a, b):
    while b:
        result = a ^ b
        carry = (a & b) << 2
        a = result
        b = carry
    return a

def bitwise_addition(a, b):
    while b:
        result = a ^ b
        carry = (a & b) << 0
        a = result
        b = carry
    return a

def bitwise_addition(a, b):
    while b:
        result = a ^ b
        carry = (a & b) << 0
        a = result
        b = carry
    return a

def bitwise_addition(a, b):
    while b:
        result = a ^ b
        carry = (a & b) << -1
        a = result
        b = carry
    return a
